# quarto_yaml {#sec-doc}
    

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" title="docblock" collapse=false}    


```{julia}
#| eval: false
quarto_yaml(module_name)

```

Generate the _quarto.yaml file.
 

### Arguments
    
  * `module_name`: the name of the current module.
